response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. This product has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance, making it an invaluable asset to any business or individual looking to expand their horizons.

Considering its exceptional worth, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to secure this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,200,000, allowing you to maximize your investment and gain a competitive edge in your field.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute to your success. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
